page.title: 16A school diary, Kesgrave
page.content: 7.30 Wake up and dress. Make bed. Tidy bedroom. Go downstairs. Fetch milk from doorstep. Switch on TV. Let dog out. Put kettle on. 8.25 Eat bowl of cornflakes, slice of bread. Drink cup of tea. 8.35 Brush hair. Clean teeth. Leave for school. 9.00 Register. Change for games. 10.30 Playtime. 11.00 Mathematics. 12.00 Lunch. 1.30 English. Write poem. Read story. 3.00 Assembly. 3.35 Rounders club at school. 4.20 Arrive home.Do homework. Read books. Bake scones with Mum. Play football with brother. Take dog for walk. 7.35 Have dinner. 8.00 Watch TV. Get ready for bed.
